participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and passionate about riding. Enjoys exploring new places.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike.

participant_2.name: Nicole
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and cheerful, loves to enjoy life and spend time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i live in a house.

content.text: nicole , yours ? i'm more of a chess person really .
Really? I've lived in the house all previous week. What about you?
no , my ocd would not let me . i cannot stand clutter dust how are you tonight ?
nice ! whatcha having ? i just got home from work and am watching my favorite movie .
I love my boyfriend so much
can we dance in the tune of my favorite band dream theater ?
No, but we can walk. I like it very much
any good ? what do you mean by that ?
after while crocodile , not to soon baboon how are you today ?
